display_long_description:
*This app needs microphone permissions to work*

Playing poker with friends was never more fun and social. Poker VR features the most expressive avatars built for Oculus Go, making reading tells even more fun. 
Wanna hone your poker skills? Join any of our daily tournaments to prove that you are the best at poker. And oh yeah, you will be playing with people from all over the world joining in from Gear VR and Oculus Go!

Main features: 
- Most expressive avatars built for reading tells! 
- Over 500M unique customizations possible.
- Use the Oculus Go controller as an extension of your hand to bet/call/fold as in real life! 
- Unlock 50 trophies as you progress in the game.
- Gift trophies and items to each other on the table.
- Introducing friends system, join any of your friends table or invite them with one tap! 
- Leaderboards are now focused on your progress, compete with your friends or in career!
